title: Forrestal Lecture at the US Naval Academy
description: In this Forrestal Lecture at the U.S. Naval Academy, Robert Heinlein discusses techniques of writing, science fiction, patriotism, and the proud traditions of the naval service. A graduate of the Naval Academy himself, Heinlein is best known for his science fiction novels and short stories. Re-issued on CD in 2007. 1 audio CD, 73 minutes total recording. Product No. AF0190D.
author: Robert A. Heinlein
